content: I have installed the spaCy library with Python for my Natural Language Processing (NLP) project using the pip command: `pip install -U spacy`. How can I verify the installed version of spaCy?

To verify the installed version of the spaCy library in your Python environment, you can use the following command in your Python interpreter or script:

```python
import spacy
print(spacy.__version__)
```

This will print the version number of the spaCy library that is currently installed. If you're running this in a terminal or command prompt, make sure you're in the correct environment where you installed spaCy.
